pr_title: [ci] Clarify wording in ensure script output

timeline.message: [ci] Clarify wording in ensure script output

timeline.bodyText:
How about
it likely means that there are newer commits in master that you need to include. Please rebase or merge master into your branch and run bin/utils/generate_samples
timeline.author: spacether
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -53,6 +53,8 @@ if [ -n "$(git status --porcelain)" ]; then
     git --no-pager diff
     echo "Perform git status"
     git status
+    echo "This runs in pull requests against the anticipated merge commit (as if the PR was merged now)."
+    echo "When you see unexpected files here, it likely means there are newer commits in master to pull into your branch."

replies.bodyText:
That last part is redundant with the line right after my change:
Please run 'bin/utils/ensure-up-to-date' locally and commit changes (UNCOMMITTED CHANGES ERROR)

:)
replies.author: jimschubert

timeline.message: Add another newline before new message
